abstract: Plan by Narconon, drug-treatment program with ties to Church of Scientology, to convert cluster of rustic cabins in Frederick County, Md, into group home has drawn opposition from community; conversion plan can proceed if cabins, in area known as Trout Run, are added to local list of historic places, prompting some to take unusual step of arguing against designation.
lead_paragraph: Narconon, which is associated with the Church of Scientology, hopes that by adding a Maryland site to a list of historic places, it will be able to build a rehabilitation center there.

headline.main: Camp David Neighbors Fight Historic Designation to Keep Out Scientology-Backed Center
headline.print_headline: Rustic Trout Run Subject of Battle Over Future Use

snippet: Narconon, which is associated with the Church of Scientology, hopes that by adding a Maryland site to a list of historic places, it will be able to build a rehabilitation center there.
